profile:
​​​​​MJ Guardian Roofing Ltd started off as a small locally owned business here in the GTA. Over the years, we expanded to Barrie, Kitchener and Niagara Falls Areas. The exceptional quality of our workmanship as well as our top customer service have made us one of the biggest and most noted company to service southern central Ontario.

​Our dedication to the craft has generated us a large client base in both residential and commercial roofing. What differentiates us from our competitors is the experience of our workers in the field, our competitive pricing, our flexible scheduling, as well as our commitment to our work.

We currently offer a wide array of roofing related services, including shingle replacements, flat roofs, metal roofs, eaves trough repair and replacements, soffits and fascia, rooftop solar system installation, skylight repair and installation, and attic spray foam insulation. We also cater to new constructions and townhouse co-ops. We prioritize the safety of both our workers as well as you and your family, and are fully insured and licensed. We also offer warranty for all our services.

Call our number today for all your roofing inquiries!​​

profile:
DingSheng Roofing is a fully insured and dedicated roofing services company, that commits to making a good faith effort for our neighbors. Our mission is to build a sincere long-term relationship with our clients. 
With over 10 years of roofing, siding, and gutter services industry experience in the K-W region, our goal is to resolve our neighbors' roofing concerns promptly. We know how hard it can be to find a contractor that does quality work at an affordable price. That’s why we take the time to go over our invoices with our customers. Transparent pricing and fine workmanship are the most valuable elements of our trusted service. We will do everything possible to fulfill your roofing needs and earn your complete trust and satisfaction. And more, we do not have an answering machine, just live, friendly people 24 hours a day to answer your calls.

profile:
Tdot Roofers is most experienced & professional roofing company in Ontario.
Flat Roof
With a myriad of flat roofing systems available and more coming on stream every year, making the right choice is difficult & challenging for the uninitiated.

Shingles
We offer complete roofing services for domestic homeowners, from slate and tile to flat roofs, and everything in between; nothing is too small or large.

Repairs
From single site SMEs to national blue chip companies, our range of quality services can cope with any size of roofing project.with any size of roofing project

Inspection
We repair roofs of both commercial and residential establishments. Other than roofing repairs, we also work on roof inspections and complete re-roofing.
services:
Commercial Roofing
We offer extensive commercial roofing services including repairs and maintenance
We have highly skilled and professional commercial roofers.
We have the resources to provide emergency roof repairs and other related services for commercial property.
We pay a great deal of attention to even the smallest of details.
We follow safety measures and use safety equipment on site.
Skylight Installation
Cutting edge skylight technology
No problem installation
Reliable performance with a high degree of longevity
The best pricing you can find anywhere
Installation and repair of skylights
Residential Roofing
Full Roof Inspection (ensuring your roof is in accordance with manufacturing standards)
Full Attic Inspection (ensures that no leaks, rot or pests/animals are developing within)
Eaves Trough Fastening and Re-enforcement all around the home perimeter
Calking of any Seems, Corners and Openings which need to be sealed
Insulation Inspection (ensuring insulation is up to par with building code)

Leak Repairs

profile:
FS ROOF SYSTEMS INC is located at 450 Dundas St N, Cambridge, ON

We Specialize in REPAIRS, MAINTENANCE, INSTALLATION, CONSULTATIONS, LEAK DETECTION of all types of Flat Roofing and Sloped roofing systems RESIDENTIAL, COMMERCIAL, INDUSTRIAL including:
-  EPDM
-  TPO
-  PVC
-  TUFDEK (waterproof solutions for decks, balconies, patios, boat houses etc)
-  HOT APPLICATIONS such as 2PLY MOD BIT (Torch on membranes), TAR AND GRAVEL
-  CUSTOM SHEET METAL FABRICATION  (STANDING SEAM, CURVED BAY ROOFS, METAL COPPING/CAPPING, ALL TYPES OF FLASHINGS AND TRIMS)
-  SHINGLES/COMPOSITE ROOFING
-  SKYLIGHTS
-  5" and 6" Seamless Aluminum, copper, steel, galvalume, Eavestrough systems
-  Custom Aluminum soffit/facia 
-  Siding

We will guide you through any project large or small with our hands on approach and attention to detail from start to finish.  Our team of talented  and professional experts always work hard to make sure we get the job done the right way.  To book your free quote or consultation call/text, or email the experts at FS ROOF SYSTEMS INC.

Tim Demers (Owner Operator) 
(519) 827-4638
tim@fsroofsystems.com

-------------------------------------------------  FS ROOF SYSTEMS " THE ART OF ROOFING " -------------------------------------------------

profile:
Servicing Kitchener, Waterloo, Cambridge and surrounding areas. We have the affordable and durable solutions for your new flat roofs, flat roof upgrades, and flat roof repair. Our flat roof experts are manufacturer approved and have years of quality roofing experience. 
A strong and sturdy Flat roof means you reduce potential building problems elsewhere. You will better protect your belongings, your inventory, and your clients and tenants. A durable flat roof will also be more energy efficient which means you can lower energy consumption and costs. There is no simpler way to increase the value of your building.
Kitchener/Waterloo residents and businesses know they can trust our flat roofing services. We work on residential houses and commercial buildings of all sizes.
CALL FOR A FREE QUOTE! 519-870-1691

profile:
We have been in the roofing industry for over 15 years. We started from being employees to becoming sales reps to moving up to estimating and then finally decided to open and operate our own business. Brother's Roofing is a family run business therefore we take workmanship and quality very serious. Our goal is to provide prompt and best service possible. We are locally owned and operated. 

We take pride in serving homeowners, commercial spaces, as well as new construction built.

profile:
NW Roofing has been around since 1978. We service Stratford, New Hamburg, Brandford-Blenheim township in Oxford County and surrounding areas.

Our expert roofers specialize in re-roofing shingled homes but we also regularly do flat roofs, fascia & soffits, eavestroughing, and minor siding repairs.  We also can help with roof repair, re-roof steeples on churches, install cedar shakes and authentic slate, and install and repair steel barn roofs. Metal flashing is customized onsite to add the finishing touches.

We are the roofing contractor you can count on for the best quality work.  Give us a call today!

Website: http://www.nwroofing.ca/
Business Email: jw@nwroofing.ca
Add: 276 Jacob St., New Hamburg, ON N3A 1B9
Business Hours: Monday-Friday 7:30am-5:30pm
No. of Employees: 5-10
Year Established: 1978
Phone: 519-684-7693
